alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 1:50PM EDT until July 29 at 2:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Gadsden County in Big Bend of Florida... Northeastern Leon County in Big Bend of Florida... Grady County in southwestern Georgia... Southwestern Thomas County in south central Georgia... * Until 230 PM EDT. * At 150 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cairo, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Cairo, Whigham, Grady Co A/p, Moncrief, Lake Iamonia, Concord, Rocky Hill, Miccosukee, Calvary, Reno, Princes Still, Pine Park, Nickleville and Beachton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
